name: Willis
effect: [On Play] You may hatch 1 Digi-Egg card to an empty space in your breeding area.[Your Turn] When one of your Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon with [Gargomon] or [Rapidmon] in its name, you may suspend this Tamer to reduce the digivolution cost by 1.
security_effect: [Security] Play this card without paying its memory cost.
